description:
A musician is haunted by the spirits of fallen samurai.  Two massive men duel for supremacy.  A transforming badger runs a con at a mountain pass.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Earless Houichi / Niou and Dokkoi / Badger Disaster
Miminashi Houichi / Niou to Dokkoi / Mujina no Sainan
耳なし芳一 / 仁王とどっこい / ムジナの災難
